price: 97. En zeg: “Mijn Heer, ik zoek mijn toevlucht bij U tegen de influisteringen van de duivels.
arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنۡ هَمَزَٰتِ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينِ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: waqul rabbi aʿūdhu bika min hamazāti al-shayāṭīni
